div.p: Within female effect of egg number on daily energy expenditure (kJ day −1) of female great tits ( Parus major) of the Hoge Veluwe ( n = 9, collected in 2009) and the Oosterhout population ( n = 4, collected in 2008). The DEE values are plotted after correcting for female body mass, temperature and area for graphing purposes only. Lines connect the two measurements of individual females
